channel.title: United States Department of State on ECTHRwatch
channel.description: Recent content in United States Department of State on ECTHRwatch

item.title: Adam ROGALSKI
item.description: Adam Rogalski Federal Bureau of Investigation Assistant Legal Attaché My communications to Mr. Rogalski are published on Adam-Rogalski.Federal-Bureau-of-Investigation.com.

item.title: Answer sent to Messrs. Rogalski (Assistant Legal Attaché, U.S. Department of State, F.B.I.) and Manjarrez (F.B.I.)
item.description:
FROM : [Whistle-blower’s email address]

TO : [Mr. Rogalski’s username]@state.gov

TO : [Mr. Manjarrez’s username]@fbi.gov

Answer sent by email to Messrs. Rogalski and Manjarrez on October 05, 2021, at 01:20 (am) Beijing time.

item.title: United States Department of State
item.description: United States Department of State Check carefully who monitors the F.B.I. since Christopher Asher WRAY declared, if I am not mistaken, that he had a financial stake in McDonalds Corporation. Possible conflict of interests. Therefore, just to be safe, I should also notify other officials. It’s one of the biggest fraud in history. We can’t leave anything to chance. For the sake of transparency, open letters to Mr. Wray will be published on Christopher-Asher-Wray.com.
